name: Jewel of the Deep
description: A fist‑sized sapphire set in living coral; tiny currents swirl inside.
effect: Aquatic Affinity: breathe underwater and gain the ability telepathically converse with sea life in short range.
upgrade: Tidal Bond: Once per day as an action summon a PL4 water elemental

name: Mirror Shard Pendant
description: A cracked silver pendant clutching a jagged mirror crystal that catches phantom reflections.
effect: Mirror Self: As an action create a mirrored version of yourself, it acts in mirror of you, meaning it cannot perform the same action as you on its turn
upgrade: Mirror Realm: As an Off-Action before taking damage show the mirror to a creature, they must make a spirit check or be sent into the mirror. When you do this the mirror is broken and they remain in the mirror, living a mirrored life to the one they knew before

name: Moonstone Circlet
description: A thin silver headband set with a black‑veined moonstone that only glimmers for beings able to glimpse the hidden moon—Vozian creatures, demons, goblins, and certain wolf‑cults.
effect: Umbral Insight: While the unseen moon is above the horizon, attuned wearers gain +1 Observation and advantage on Survival checks made at night. As an action you may focus for 1 minute on a spot in dim light or darkness to read sinister echoes of events that occurred there within the last 24 hours
upgrade: Eclipse Augury. Once per long rest, if you can perceive the moon, enter a 10‑minute trance. For the next hour you may reroll one failed check and automatically sense illusions or shape‑shifted creatures within short range. After the hour you gain the Haunted condition until you finish a long rest.

name: Phoenix Feather Amulet
description: A golden torque suspending a still‑smoldering scarlet feather; faint embers drift around it.
effect: Rebirth: When you would take the Death condition, instead remove the death conditions and the injured condition and set your current wounds to 1, you burst into light dealing 1 fire damage to all creatures within reach range and this amulet is destroyed
upgrade: Second Flame: You are immune to heat damage.

name: Eclipse Cloak
description: A dark cloak stitched with eclipse-thread, light-absorbing and frayed.
effect:
Stealth Bonus +2
Action: Turn invisible for 1 minute. While in The Eclipse, Shadowstep to a visible point in short range.
upgrade: Enhanced Cloak: Shadowstep becomes a half-action. Gain resistance to physical damage while invisible.

name: Shapeshifter’s Cloak
description: Iridescent mantle threaded with elemental essence; colours ripple with ambient energy.
effect: Shapeshift: Once per day as an action shift into the form of another creature or object your general size and shape for 1 hour
upgrade: Protective Shift: When you shapeshift you gain +10 armor until the end of your next turn

name: Stormcaller Gauntlets
description: Polished orichalcum gloves buzzing with static.
effect: Tempest Aura: As an action cause a flurry of wind to erupt around you and swirl until the end of your next turn, creatures within reach range have disadvantage to hit you and you have advantage on any of those creatures.
upgrade: Your Tempest Aura caused the Blind and Deaf condition to all creatures in reach range

name: Chimeric Bracers
description: Articulated bronze cuffs inlaid with shifting bestial glyphs.
effect: Beastmelding: Once per day as an action, choose one animal trait to enhance yourself with for 1 hour (night‑vision long range, swim speed +20 ft, climb speed +20 ft, observation advantage).
upgrade: Gain 2 traits when you use Beastmelding

name: Ethereal Bandolier
description: The bandolier only appears to others in darkness under Eclipse light
effect:
Your weapons naturally reload as if aided by an unseen force.
Hollow Point: As an Off-Action once per day, infuse your next weapon attack with +5 eclipse damage
upgrade: You can use hollow point 3 times per day

name: Bag of Beasts
description: a large brown leather bag with the face of an animal etched into the side.
effect: Summon: As an action summon a [[1d4-1]] PL animal spirit that remains for 1 hour. You can have a number of forest spirits equal to half your Spirit Check
upgrade: When you summon a animal spirit, double its PL

name: Elemental Prism
description: Palm‑sized crystalline tetrahedron refracting raw planar energies.
effect: Absorb: As an Off-Action in response to taking elemental damage, take half and store that amount in the prism for 1 minute. You can imbue a spell or weapon with the elemental damage as an Off-Action, it remains until the end of your next turn or until used
upgrade: You can store the damage indefinitely, when you take elemental damage you gain +10 armor until the end of your next turn once per day

name: Harbinger’s Horn
description: Ebony hunting horn carved with necromantic motifs, a skeleton hand curls around the horn.
effect: Spectral Steed: Once per day as an action summon PL 3 spectral skeletal horse for 1 hour that has double your movement speed
upgrade: Umbral Fear: When you summon the steed creatures within short range that hear the horn must make an intellect check or take the fear condition

name: Traveler’s Lantern
description: Copper road‑lamp that absorbs wandering motes.
effect: Ignite (Action): Unleash stored flame. All creatures you choose in short range take 1d4 + 1 fire. Creatures of the Eclipse take double damage.
upgrade: Flashing Ignite: Every creature damaged by Ignite must pass an Observation check or be blind until the end of your next turn.

name: Void Lantern
description: Black iron lamp engraved with soul‑binding sigils.
effect: Soul Cage: Target one lesser spirit (PL 1 or lower) within short range and make a Spirit check. On a success, the spirit is sealed in the lantern. Later, as an Off-action, you may release it to summon a demon version of it for 1 minute, it may follow your commands
upgrade: Twin Cage (Passive): The lantern can hold two spirits at once. While at least one spirit is sealed you have Resistance 2 against Eclipse damage.

name: Hearth‑Beacon
description: Brass carriage lantern glowing with homely fire.
effect: Guiding Flame: Your light cuts through magical darkness . Additionally you and your allies have advantage on intellect and survival checks to navigate
upgrade: Beacon’s Shelter: Allies who finish a Press On or Rest inside the light heal an extra +10 wounds and repair +10 more armor

name: Stellar Reliquary
description: Crystal lantern flecked with stardust.
effect: Starlight Pulse: Once per day as an action, heal allies for +5 and remove a cognition condition.
upgrade: When you use Starlight Pulse, undead and demons must make a spirit check or take the fear condition

name: Crucible Lamp
description: Rotating cage of molten glass.
effect: Flux Burst: Once per day as an action, choose Fire, Ice, or Lightning. All creatures you choose in short range take 1d6 of the chosen element.
upgrade: Echo Burst: Immediately after Flux Burst you may repeat the same damage as an off‑action (once per use).

name: Somnolent Sconce
description: Seashell lantern that hums with dream‑notes.
effect: Lullaby: Once per day as an action, Every creature in short range hears soft chimes. Each must make a Spirit check; on a failure the creature takes the Unconsious condition until the start of their turn
upgrade: Dream Shackles: A creature that wakes from Lullaby has disadvantage on its first attack or check.

name: Axiom Beacon
description: Geometric steel frame humming with runes of law.
effect: Silence of Law: As an action, Until the end of your next turn, spells cast within short range are made at disadvantage.
upgrade: Inviolate Form: When you use Silence of Law you also gain a spell immune shield that negates the next spell cast on you.

name: Willowglow Lamp
description: Living‑wood cage sprouting tiny blossoms.
effect: Verdant Leap: As a half-action, until the end of your next turn, each non-draconic ally that starts its turn within reach range  of your light can teleport short range to a space they can can see within range (once per creature).
upgrade: Blooming Ward: A creature that teleports with Verdant Leap gains +10 armor until the end of its next turn.

name: Elemental Gauntlet
description: A rune-etched gauntlet that channels unstable elemental force.
effect: Elemental Blast: Once per day as an action, target a creature in short range and make a Spirit check, on a success deal damage equal to your spirit check, You can choose fire, ice, thunder, or lighting.
upgrade: Has 3 charges, recovers 1 charge the first time you enter a storm

name: Jawbone Knuckles
description: Hardened jawbones bound in copper wire, taken from a serial killer and etched with binding glyphs.
effect: While worn, you gain Bonus +2 to attack checks and hear whispers when near the dying or recently dead.
upgrade: Once per day, reroll a failed Spirit check. Success or fail, you gain the Fear condition as you are haunted by the dead.

name: Skeletal Dagger
description: A jagged dagger carved from a humanoid spine, bound with eclipse twine and dripping faint mist.
effect: Summon: As an action summon a PL1 Spectral Skeleton that remains for 1 hour. Can have a maximum number of Spectral Skeletons equal to half your Spirit Check
upgrade: If a skeleton kills a creature it gain +1 PL and remains and does not dissipate after 1 hour.

name: Soulkeeper Blade
description: Ebony steel whose channels trap wisps of violet light.
effect: Harvest: When a living creature dies within short range of you, you can, as an off-action, Harvest their soul with your soul keeper blade. When you harvest a soul your weapon gain +1 bonus to checks and damage, to a maximum of +3
upgrade: Soul Fury: You can expend a soul from your soul keeper blade and immediately make an attack against a creature in your range with the soulkeeper blade
